info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.known_label
info.description:
Known labels serves two purposes

Its let users declare labels so that they can be consistently used across their namespaces. Declared labels can be used by the Web UI in drop down. Description field in the label lets everyone know what this label means.

System allocates unique integer (ID) values for known labels. These ID(s) are used in Network Policy or Service Policy enforcement. Hence only Known labels can be used in Network Policy or L7 Policy.

post.description: Create creates a new label in shared namespace. Any other namespace requested will return error

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace in which to create the label

post.description: Delete will delete a given label label key = label value from current tenants shared namespace

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace of the label to be deleted

get.description:
Get is generic label query. Two types of queries are supported
   Return label with exact matching entry label key = label value.
   Return list of labels that have prefix of label key = label value.
Returns list of labels. Query will look into current tenants shared namespace and ves-io shared.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for the label to be retrieved

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Query type

Generic Get of all available labels for a given tenant
Get exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)
Get prefix match of label.key = label.value
Get prefix match of label.key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
x-example: "ves.io/region"
Key of the label to be retrieved

parameters.name: value
parameters.description:

Value of the label to be retrieved

known_labelCreateRequest.description: Create label request in shared namespace. Only shared namespace supported
known_labelCreateRequest.title: Create Label Request

description.description:
Description of the label to be created

Example: ` "Paris metro region in France (EU)"`
description.title: Description

key.description:
Key for the label to be created

Example: ` "ves.io/region"`
key.title: Key

namespace.description:
Namespace in which to create the label

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace

value.description:
Value of the label to be created

Example: ` "ves-io-par"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.k8s_label_value: true
value.title: Value

key.description:
Key of the label to be deleted

Example: ` "ves.io/region"`
key.title: Key

namespace.description:
Namespace of the label to be deleted

Example: ` "value"`

value.description:
Value of the label to be deleted

Example: ` "ves-io-par"`

  ves.io.schema.rules.string.k8s_label_value: true
value.title: Value

description.description:
Description of what this label means

Example: ` "Paris metro region in France (EU)"`
description.title: description

known_labelQueryType.description:
x-displayName: "Query Type"
Type of label query

 - QUERY_ALL_LABELS: x-displayName: "All Labels"
Generic Get of all available labels for a given tenant
 - QUERY_EXACT_LABEL: x-displayName: "Exact Label"
Get exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)
 - QUERY_VALUE_PREFIX_LABELS: x-displayName: "Label Value Prefix"
Get prefix match of label.key = label.value
 - QUERY_KEY_PREFIX_LABELS: x-displayName: "Label Key Prefix"
Get prefix match of label.key
known_labelQueryType.title: QueryType
